images.copyright: Aerial view of a road separating two lakes in the Scottish Highlands (© Abstract Aerial Art/Getty Images)
images.title: We've made it to Halfway Day!
images.caption: Halfway Day
images.desc: Congratulations! It's Halfway Day, the midpoint of the year. We've lived through 182 days of 2022, and today is the first of 182 days left—we're halfway there. It's up to us whether we see this as a glass-half-full or a glass-half-empty day… But the past is gone, so we're all for making the most of the remainder of the year.
images.bsTitle: We've made it to Halfway Day!
